alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 1:56PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Helena and northwestern Tangipahoa Parishes, southwestern Pike and southeastern Amite Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 156 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Greensburg, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Amite City, Kentwood, Roseland, Osyka and Tangipahoa. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 47 and 66. Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana...and southern Mississippi.
